auth.create_account_description: Create an account to start tracking your workouts
auth.welcome_back: Welcome back! Sign in to continue
auth.email_not_confirmed: Please confirm your email before signing in

verify_email.title: Check your email
verify_email.description: We've sent you a verification link. Please check your email to activate your account.
verify_email.check_spam: Also check your spam folder if you can't find the email.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: Enter your email and we'll send instructions to reset your password.
reset_password.check_email_description: If an account exists with this email, we've sent password reset instructions.
reset_password.check_spam: If you can't find the email in your inbox, check your spam folder.
reset_password.new_password_description: Please enter your new password below.
reset_password.invalid_or_expired: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

workout.delete_confirmation_description: This action will delete the workout and all associated exercises. Are you sure you want to continue?
workout.create_workout_description: Create a new workout routine by adding exercises
workout.no_workouts_description: You haven't created any workouts yet. Start by creating your first workout!

tracking.title: Efficient Tracking
tracking.description: Log your sets quickly and efficiently during workouts

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Monitor your strength gains over time

custom.title: Custom Workouts
custom.description: Create and customize your workout routines
